Inbound email traffic exhibiting charact.Action: Analyze Zeek smtp.log for emails with suspicious characteristics (e.g., unusual sender domains, high volume to multiple recipients, presence of links/attachments). Correlate with Zeek http.log for connections resulting from email links. Use entropy measures on sender domain strings to identify potentially randomly generated domains.

Outbound network connections to free/dis.Action: Monitor Zeek dns.log and conn.log for connections to known disposable email domains or free service providers. Analyze connection patterns and volume to identify attempts to register or access infrastructure. Use frequency analysis to identify newly contacted domains or services that have low historical interaction.
